titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Parking and Transportation Services (University of Michigan) photograph collection.

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Parking and Transportation Services (University of Michigan) photograph collection.

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: University of Michigan unit responsible for operating campus bus service. Transit service was established in 1946.
archdesc.scopecontent: Digital images of University of Michigan buses and events taken in 2006 for the 60th anniversary of campus transportation services. Disc contains 48 jpg digital files.
